reviewText: Love that I was able to find the umbrella Christmas tree movie cuz I used to watch it as a kid and now I can enjoy it with my daughter

I watched under the umbrella tree as a kid and when I saw it here on amazon i just had to buy it for my kids ! The stories are great today as they were back then my youngest has loved this so much ! The dvd is great and with easy to use menus. Perfect for nostalgia purposes !
My kids loved this! It came very fast.
I watched this as a kid, and its exactly how I remembered it.  These DVDs are really hard to find.  Since it is an older show the quality isn't HD but still good enough for my 2 yr old.

This show use to be my daughters favorite. Now that she has her own daughter I bought this DVD for them to enjoy together.  It was a surprise to her I was able to find it and she said it was as good as she remembered it to be.

I watched Under the Umbrella Tree every day with my son when he was little.  It is such a family friendly show and enjoyable to watch.  Each episode had its' own moral that even small children could understand such as friendship or not giving up when something we are trying to do is difficult

This DVD contains the Christmas episode.
